meanings.definition: A brand of kitchen appliance used for mixing ingredients.
meanings.sent1: My mom's new mixmasters make baking so much easier.
meanings.sent2: The chef's favorite mixmasters are always in use at the restaurant.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally mistook the mixmasters for blenders and made a mess in the kitchen.
meanings.sent4: Her mixmasters were like magical wands, turning flour and eggs into delicious cakes.
meanings.sent5: The shiny mixmasters on the counter gleamed under the kitchen lights.

meanings.definition: Skilled DJs who mix music tracks together.
meanings.sent1: The mixmasters at the party kept everyone dancing all night long.
meanings.sent2: The famous mixmasters are known for their incredible remixes.
meanings.sent3: The mixmasters played a game of musical chairs with the songs.
meanings.sent4: Their mixmasters were like wizards, weaving melodies into a magical tapestry.
meanings.sent5: The crowd cheered as the mixmasters seamlessly blended one song into another.

meanings.definition: A group of individuals who excel at blending different elements or styles.
meanings.sent1: The design team were true mixmasters, combining colors and patterns effortlessly.
meanings.sent2: The mixmasters of fashion created a stunning new trend.
meanings.sent3: The mixmasters of the group could turn any idea into a masterpiece.
meanings.sent4: Their team was like a mixmasters orchestra, harmonizing ideas into a beautiful symphony.
meanings.sent5: The mixmasters of creativity never failed to amaze with their innovative collaborations.
